While everyone has something sexual to say, I’d like to point a few other things out. 

You’re probably living a very comfortable life, as evidenced by private school and a big diamond ring (real), and your better than average looks means you’re fairly well insulated from the hardships and hard times many others experience, which also happens to make them interesting (something you’ll never be).

This will go one of two ways for you, both are clichè;

You continue your boring unchallenging existence and go to college and get a business-ey “big girl” job and you’ll marry a milquetoast bro that can’t stop talking about his frat, pop out a couple of boring kids, as what looks you have will fade and you’ll find out your asshole husband (that you never really loved, anyway) is banging escorts. You fade to white wine Xanax suburbia and wonder why you’re so bitter. 

Alternatively, you’ll start smoking a bit of pot here and there, a friend gives you an Adderal, you like it a bit too much and end up sucking black dude’s dicks for heroin by the time you’re 20. 

Anyway, have a nice life!!!
